_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

What happens when desire, greed, relishi: That form will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
That feeling will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
That perception will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
Those choices will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
That consciousness will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
